commit message: Fix a bug related to having a priority but not a todo item, closes bug #27
Bump version number for small bugfix
Support for modifying attributes of nodes through the agenda view
Use new Node.nodeId field for the Edit Document button
Place the TODO and Priority selectors in a scrollable view, close issue #29
Fix a bug where we would treat capital letters as a todo if they were at the front of the title, closes bug #30
UTF-8 is chosen as encoding for putting captured strings via WebDAV synchronizer.
Fix a potential empty line bug
Fix a potential null reference bug

- don't generate an error if we can't find an existing mobileorg.org
- support editing the heading of an org entry
- fix a bug where we would remove the mobileorg.org file even if we encountered an http error
Fix a potential sync bug if you refuse to enter any settings, bump version number
Fix soft keyboard hiding the save button in the capture window, patch by sachac
Patch to help the broken lighttpd 1.4 which doesn't know how to deal with the 'Expect' header.  This will probably help older versions of Nginx too.
Fix back button bug, we now display the right page depending on where you were.  Also, fix a bug where we weren't displaying the document if you long click and click 'view as document'
Support editing of nodes and fix bugs related to nodes that don't have an Id value
Remove the 'Edit Body' button until I can get this to work
